section.p: The guide’s name is Akoboshi. Cross off his fee of if you haven’t already done so. When you ask him what game there is hereabouts, he replies: ‘Well, there are foxes, badgers and wild boar, but it’s risky to bother creatures like those. They often live to a ripe old age, you see, and learn many magical tricks. It’s safer if we just hunt deer.’

At the end of a long day you return to the lodge weary and footsore. Lose 1 Stamina point. You never got a glimpse of a deer, but Akoboshi has given you a few hunter’s tips. , and if you get more than your SCOUTING score you can increase it by 1.
